Module.Name: appmsw-forbid-old-passwd\
Module.Description: Prohibit the use of old passwords.

Author.Notes:
repository: https://github.com/SergeyMi37/appmsw-forbid-old-passwd
description: To meet the requirements of section 8.2.5 PCI DSS "Prohibit the use of old passwords", a small application has been implemented that will be launched by the system when a user tries to change a password and check if it was used before.
